data.title: Hold B Tower and B Main Like This
data.description: Use your Sky Smokes and Incendiaries to hold down important chokepoints into B Site and B Tower by using the different variations shown in this video.

data.title: Hold A Main and Tower Like This
data.description: Use your Sky Smokes and Incendiaries to hold down important chokepoints into A Site and A Tower by using the different variations shown in this video.
